channel.title: Adding books
channel.description: Well since my last topic wasn't resolved I guess I'll post it again. I recently made a quest in which you reicived a damaged book. Now does anyone know how I can make it so that when you use all 4 different pages of that book, on the damaged book, you reicive a holy/unholy/balanced book? I've been struggling with this for a while now so thank you to anyone who helps.

item.title: Adding books
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You could try packet 53, which is the packet for using an item on another item.

if (itemUsed == # && useWith == #) { // Prayer book deleteItem(#, getItemSlot(#), 1); addItem(#, #); sendMessage("You place a page into the book."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding books
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I could do that… I’ll just have to rename some models. I actully really like the idea, Thanks! If anyone else has a better idea feel free to post.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding books
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

hmm i think this is possible make a code if page 1 is used on object id replace with id so i mean make it if u use one page on the empty book it replaces with a book called 1paged book, so make it if u use the second page on it it changes to 2 paged books, hmm its kinda chaos message , but i hope u understand all u have to do is or make 4 costum models(1pagedbook-2pagedbook…) or yust change names .

item.title: Adding books
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Well since my last topic wasn’t resolved I guess I’ll post it again. I recently made a quest in which you reicived a damaged book. Now does anyone know how I can make it so that when you use all 4 different pages of that book, on the damaged book, you reicive a holy/unholy/balanced book? I’ve been struggling with this for a while now so thank you to anyone who helps.
